title: Philippe Sands, the storytelling lawyer
summary: He has won cases against the dictator Pinochet and played a role in establishing the International Criminal Court. However, it's as a writer that this lawyer makes fundamental human rights concepts accessible. His current major project is defending the Palestinian Authority.

Although limited in scope for the time being, these measures set in motion mechanisms and establish precedents that worry Israel.
